quotes.message: Stand Tall, Stand Proud. Know that you are unique and magnificent. You do not need the approval of others.
quotes.name: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.message: Always hold your head up, but be careful to keep your nose at a friendly level.
quotes.name: Max L. Forman

quotes.message: So keep your head high, keep your chin up, and most importantly, keep smiling, because life's a beautiful thing and there's so much to smile about.
quotes.name: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.message: Never let your head hang down. Never give up and sit down and grieve. Find another way. And don't pray when it rains if you don't pray when the sun shines.
quotes.name: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.message: Put your shoulders back, hold your head up high knowing that the same power that raised Christ from the dead lives on the inside of you.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: Keep your head up in failure and your head down in success.
quotes.name: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.message: It takes someone strong to leave with their head held high. It takes someone stronger to stay with their head held higher.
quotes.name: Isabella Poretsis

quotes.message: Someone once asked me how I hold my head up so high after all I've been through. I said, it's because no matter what, I am a survivor. Not a victim.
quotes.name: Patricia Buckley

quotes.message: It is important to keep your head up and follow what you believe is right.
quotes.name: Ajay Naidu

quotes.message: Even though you're fed up, you've got to keep your head up.
quotes.name: Tupac Shakur

quotes.message: Keep your head up. God gives his hardest battles to his strongest soldiers.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: I know it seems hard sometimes but remember one thing. Through every dark night, there's a bright day after that. So no matter how hard it get, stick your chest out, keep ya head up and handle it.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: If you aren't in over your head, how do you know how tall you are?
quotes.name: T. S. Eliot

quotes.message: I'm a child of God. God is my mommy, my daddy. That's the only thing that'll keep my head up. If I don't remember who I am in him, I'm done.
quotes.name: Mary J. Blige

quotes.message: I admire someone who has been through a lot and still keeps their head up.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Never think about something wrong you did in the past, always look forward with your head up high; have no regrets.
quotes.name: Jared Leto

quotes.message: And I know this world is so cold and deceiving but I keep my head up like my nose is bleeding.
quotes.name: Lil Wayne

quotes.message: Lift your head up high, and scream to the world. I know I am someone, and let the truth unfurl.
quotes.name: Michael Jackson

quotes.message: You cannot hold your head high with your hand out.
quotes.name: PROVERBS

quotes.message: Hold your head high, stick your chest out. You can make it. It gets dark sometimes but morning comes.... Keep hope alive.
quotes.name: Jesse Jackson

quotes.message: As the world falls, I will keep my head up high because I know at the end of the time, I fall with my heart sorrowing into the sky.
quotes.name: Christina Dessert

quotes.message: Never let anyone tell you who you are, hold your head up high, look them in the eyes and TELL them who you are.
quotes.name: Sonya Parker

quotes.message: Keep your head up. It has to get worse before it gets better.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: No matter how much it hurts, you have to hold your head up and keep going.
quotes.name: Brooke Addison

quotes.message: He who is silent and bows his head dies every time he does so. He who speaks aloud and walks with his head held high dies only once.
quotes.name: Giovanni Falcone

quotes.message: Always hold your head up high, even if on the inside you're about to cry. Pretend that nothing is wrong at all. Close your eyes before you fall. If you can't see it, it's not there.
quotes.name: Sarah R.

quotes.message: Keep your heels, head and standards high.
quotes.name: Coco Chanel

quotes.message: Sometimes you just have to hold your head up high, blink away the tears and say good-bye.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: You have to lift your head up out of the mud and just do it.
quotes.name: Teri Garr

quotes.message: It is better to have your head in the clouds, and know where you are... than to breathe the clearer atmosphere below them, and think that you are in paradise.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: Keep your head up and be patient.
quotes.name: A. J. McLean

quotes.message: Sometimes life hits you in the head with a brick. Don't lose faith.
quotes.name: Steve Jobs

quotes.message: Keep your head up, keep your heart strong.
quotes.name: Shalane Flanagan

quotes.message: The nail that sticks its head up is the one that gets hit.
quotes.name: Japanese Proverb

quotes.message: When love is lost, do not bow your head in sadness; instead keep your head up high and gaze into heaven for that is where your broken heart has been sent to heal.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: I think my mind blown, I barely feel my feet. I'mma hold my head high even in defeat.
quotes.name: Rick Ross

quotes.message: Rather hold my head high and die than live and duck.
quotes.name: Fabolous

quotes.message: Keep your head held high because the floor isn't very interesting to look at.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: [Z-Ro] Cause everything's going to be alright
quotes.name: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quotes.message: To everyone battling a difficulty or under attack right now, smile, keep your head up, keep moving and stay positive, you'll get through it.
quotes.name: Germany Kent

quotes.message: If I’m going to have hope, I’m going to have to learn to endure disappointment.
quotes.name: Sharon Weil

quotes.message: How do I deal with people who look down on me? I look up at them.
quotes.name: Ljupka Cvetanova

quotes.message: Keep your heads up! We are sinking!
quotes.name: Ljupka Cvetanova

quotes.message: Always keep your mind strong with thoughts of positivity; your head up with full confidence and a big smile on your face, because you truly have greatness in you.
quotes.name: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.message: You've got keep your head up, keep fighting, and do the best you can.
quotes.name: Pablo Sandoval

quotes.message: I know it seems hard sometimes but remember one thing. Through every dark night, there's a bright day after that. So no matter how hard it get, stick your chest out, keep ya head up.... and handle it.
quotes.name: Tupac Shakur

quotes.message: Above all, I would like to be remembered as a man who was selfless, who strove and worried so that others could share the glory, and who built up a family of people who could hold their heads up high and say 'We're Liverpool'.
quotes.name: Bill Shankly

quotes.message: God knows your value; He sees your potential. You may not understand everything you are going through right now. But hold your head up high, knowing that God is in control and he has a great plan and purpose for your life.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: That's typically American. Keep out of trouble and tell other people to keep their chins up.
quotes.name: John Mortimer

quotes.message: Come on, you know, chin up, chest out, and best foot forward
quotes.name: Richard Sherman

quotes.message: When you walk through a storm keep your chin up high and don't be afraid of the dark.
quotes.name: Oscar Hammerstein II

quotes.message: At the end of the storm is golden sky and the sweet silver song of a lark.
quotes.name: Oscar Hammerstein II

quotes.message: Off you pop, then, and keep your chin up.
quotes.name: Jason Wilson

quotes.message: Eyes bright, chins up, smiles on. I'm talking to you, Katniss.
quotes.name: Simon Beaufoy

quotes.message: You keep your chin up Gus Grimly. We're winning this thing. Don't you forget.
quotes.name: Noah Hawley

quotes.message: Anyway, chin up, love..
quotes.name: Terence Rattigan

quotes.message: Pack up your troubles in your old kit bag, and smile, smile, smile!
quotes.name: Jack Rose

quotes.message: But, chin up. There's a medal in it for sure.
quotes.name: Sam Mendes

quotes.message: So chin up chum. You're a beautiful, beautiful human being, and the world is your sunshine.
quotes.name: Sam Voutas

quotes.message: Chin up, Chang. Believe in yourself and others will, too.
quotes.name: Jon Bokenkamp

quotes.message: Chin up, Max. It's better to be sad than dead.
quotes.name: Paul Adelstein

quotes.message: What, are you crying? You don't cry, all right? You keep your chin up. Come on, keep your chin up. Crying never helped anybody do anything, okay? You have a problem, you face it like a man.
quotes.name: Jonathan Hensleigh

quotes.message: So keep your chin up and look up high. You'll find your troubles will pass you by.
quotes.name: Don Bluth

quotes.message: Chin up, chin up . Everybody loves a happy face . Wear it, share it . It'll brighten up the darkest place . Twinkle, sparkle . Let a little sunshine in . You'll be on the right side, looking at the bright side . Up with your chinny-chin-chin.
quotes.name: E.B. White

quotes.message: There's nothing more uncertain than the life of a man like me. You're so young and so beautiful, and you will be for a long time to come. Remember, no matter what happens, I want you to promise you'll keep your chin up.
quotes.name: Paul Hervey Fox

quotes.message: I remember hurting her and her hurting me . I remember losing sleep, she was haunting my dreams . It's alright, chin up kid, it'll all be fine .
quotes.name: Austin Bello

quotes.message: Life goes on, the ending's the starting line . Chin up, press on, you will survive . Young love that lasts is hard to find .
quotes.name: Austin Bello

quotes.message: When you're going through your rough time . Maybe I could be your lifeline .
quotes.name: Felix Kurt Jaehn

quotes.message: Keeping your head up to the sky . Keeping your mind to stay alive . Gimme your wings so we can fly, . (fly away, fly away, fly away) .
quotes.name: Michael Jackson

quotes.message: It's summertime, lights fade away . It's wintertime, let's make it summer .
quotes.name: Eric Dan

quotes.message: It's gonna be alright . Keep your head up to the sky .
quotes.name: Joseph Wayne McVey

quotes.message: Keep your head up, because there's always tomorrow . Put the Lord first, be strong, you can't go wrong .
quotes.name: Tim James

quotes.message: All praises due to the Most High (To the Most High) . To the Most High heed your prayer to the sky .
quotes.name: Tim James

quotes.message: Sweet dreams are made of this . Who am I to disagree? . I've traveled the world and the seven seas . Everybody's looking for something . Hold your head up .
quotes.name: Annie Lennox

quotes.message: Hey, you might not see it with your eyes . But keep your head up to the sky . The sun is coming through .
quotes.name: Brittany Waddell

quotes.message: Rolling . Keep your head up, look to the sky . Rolling . Don't you ever ask yourself why . Rolling . We'll live forever, you and I .
quotes.name: Amy Wadge

quotes.message: We'll be there for eternity . I want you there yeah I want you there with me . Keep your head up he's coming some day to .
quotes.name: Benjamin Winans

quotes.message: If you been hurt, keep your head up, you'll find .
quotes.name: Kip Collins

quotes.message: You should never give it up never give it up never give it up . Learn to love yourself . That's why u got to keep it up got to keep it up got to keep it up .
quotes.name: Ayn Robbins

quotes.message: Don't let it get the best of you, you'll make it out alive . Oh, people like us we've gotta stick together . Keep your head up, nothing lasts forever . Here's to the lost and forgotten .
quotes.name: Meghan Shahnaz Kabir

quotes.message: What do you do when it's too much for you . Chin up, chin up . You know these sticks and these stones cannot break my bones .
quotes.name: Isabella Podpadec

quotes.message: Encourage one another and you must keep that same encouragement yourself first, to encourage others, second keep your head up and count all joy in the worst of times.
quotes.name: Robert L. Caldwell

quotes.message: Encourage others today! So often the difference between success and failure is belief.
quotes.name: Jon Gordon

quotes.message: Weed and feed. Our minds are like a garden; each day you need to weed out the negativity and feed it positivity.
quotes.name: Jon Gordon

quotes.message: You are more powerful than your circumstances. They don't define you. You do.
quotes.name: Jon Gordon

quotes.message: The story you tell yourself defines the life you live and the actions you take. It's important to tell yourself a positive story.
quotes.name: Jon Gordon

quotes.message: Regain your power, every word that leaves your mouth should breathe love.
quotes.name: Carolyn Odle

quotes.message: It is important to observe, question, interpret, and then empower yourself to make the choices with which you can live.
quotes.name: Harvey J. Coleman

quotes.message: We must also look into our feelings of grief and loss. When we accept that everything is constantly changing, when we accept the inevitability that people and animals die, we can deal with pain in a much better fashion.
quotes.name: Aaron Soltys

quotes.message: Embrace your grief and your sadness felt towards those that have passed and remember them with love.
quotes.name: Aaron Soltys

quotes.message: Replace your grief with love and appreciation. That is truly what any who have departed from our lives would wish for us.
quotes.name: Aaron Soltys

quotes.message: You associate with people who are kind, compassionate, and joyous. You keep good company, and you reflect these qualities yourself.
quotes.name: Miranda Kerr

quotes.message: I choose to be around people who uplift and support me and themselves.
quotes.name: Miranda Kerr

quotes.message: You value yourself, spiritually, mentally, and physically. You are a unique individual with so many talents and gifts.
quotes.name: Miranda Kerr

quotes.message: I am worthy of all the good in the world has to offer.
quotes.name: Miranda Kerr

quotes.message: As tides of life rise and fall, life is constant, like the waves crashing upon the shore. Persistence is the key in high and low times...
quotes.name: James A. Murphy

quotes.message: Encourage yourself, speak to yourself, and lift yourself right on up. Encourage yourself that change its here. Encourage yourself to continue to pursue.
quotes.name: Delene Williams

quotes.message: Encourage yourself to carry it out, to walk it out, to search it out, shout it out, and praise your way out to the change that's being presented with encouragement.
quotes.name: Delene Williams
